medical_history.chief_complaint: Acute onset right lower quadrant (RLQ) pain.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient was in her usual state of health until last night at 10 PM when she became bloated and developed sharp, relentless RLQ pain. Pain persisted all day today as colicky, throbbing pain at baseline, worse at its peak. She has never experienced similar pain before. Associated symptoms include nausea, dizziness, mild chills, and diarrhea overnight. Pain was aggravated by food (oatmeal) leading to decreased appetite today.
